DOC.brief_summary: The aim investigate whether implementation web-based support woman type 1 diabetes pregnancy early motherhood improve well-being self management diabetes . Type 1 diabetes associate increase medical risk increase psychosocial pressure relation childbearing . There need extend support health care professional peer . Web-based intervention improve personal capacity self-management people long- term illness evaluate childbearing woman type 1 diabetes . A web site prototype full-size browser mobile device develop participatory design multidisciplinary researcher , health care professional , experience mother type 1 diabetes web designer . In randomised control study develop web site offering information , communication health care professional , person-centred self-care diary online social community include woman , provide intervention group early pregnancy admission specialise antenatal clinic six hospital Sweden . A control group receive standard care ( usual care ) . Total n = 160 . Primary outcome Well-Being Questionnaire Diabetes Empowerment Scale . The intervention offer proactive solution strengthen patient ' decision making diabetes daily life pregnancy early motherhood , expect increase wellbeing , personal capacity knowledge diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Web-based Support During Pregnancy Early Motherhood Women With Type 1 Diabetes ( MODIAB-web )
